name: The Old Empire
summary:
Slaughter! This is a role-playing game set in the Roman age where you have to annihilate your enemies at any price, your actions detrermine who you are so you have it before acting without compassion. 
In this game there is no good or bad, only death and survival, but can you use a productive strategy? Think that you really use your strategies with your head as if only the enemies will attack you and it will be your end, in this game there are several modalities to make it more dynamic and fun
